description:
A game launcher with its own embedded BitTorrent client.

Hydra is a Game Launcher with its own embedded BitTorrent Client. The launcher is written in TypeScript (Electron) and Python, which handles the torrenting system by using libtorrent.
- Fixed download by torrent not working on Linux and Steam Deck
- Fixed profile picture upload not working Linux and Steam Deck
- Rework achievement notification as the current version was causing some graphical issues
- Added "Launch Hydra minimized" option
- Fixed some games not being matched to downloads
- Embedded support chat
